TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit PrincipalServerDownException extends System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalException

Docs.summary: This exception is thrown when the API is unable to connect to the server.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Instantiates a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The default constructor initializes a new instance of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalServerDownException> class. The <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property is initialized to a system-supplied message that describes the error. This message takes into account the current system culture. The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property is initialized to `null`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message) cil managed

Docs.summary: Instantiates a new instance of the class with the specified error message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalServerDownException> instance is initialized with the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property set to the value of `message`. If `message` is `null`, the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property is initialized to a system-supplied message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalServerDownException> instance is initialized with the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property set to the value of `message` and the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property set to the value of `innerException`. If `message` is `null`, the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property is initialized to a system-supplied message. The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> is initialized to `null`.

If `message` is `null`, the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property is initialized to a system-supplied message.

Docs.param: The text of the error message.
Docs.summary: Instantiates a new instance of the class with the specified error message, the specified nested exception, and the specified error code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalServerDownException> instance is initialized with the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property set to the value of `message` and the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property set to the value of `innerException`, and the private `errorCode` property is set to `errorCode`. If `message` is `null`, the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property is initialized to a system-supplied message. The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> is initialized to `null`.

MemberSignature.Value: public PrincipalServerDownException (string message, Exception innerException, int errorCode, string serverName);

Docs.summary: Instantiates a new instance of the class with the specified error message, the specified nested exception, the specified error code, and the specified server name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalServerDownException> instance is initialized with the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property set to the value of `message` and the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property set to the value of `innerException`, the private `errorCode` property is set to `errorCode`, and the private `serverName` property is set to `serverName`. If `message` is `null`, the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property is initialized to a system-supplied message. The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> is initialized to `null`.

Docs.param: A object that will hold the serialized object data.
A object that will hold contextual information about the source or destination.
Docs.summary: Sets the with the parameter name and additional exception information.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalServerDownException.GetObjectData%2A> sets a <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> with all the exception object data targeted for serialization. During deserialization, the exception object is reconstituted from the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> transmitted over the stream.
For more information, see <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>.
